item.title: Decrypting Mobile App Traffic using AES Killer and Frida
item.description: In this post, I’ll be discussing how to decrypt the mobile app AES Encrypted traffic on the fly using AES Killer. Pre-requisites Familiarity with Frida and hooking Familiarity with Burpsuite and Genymotion Requirements and Setup 11x256 demo app and server Android App NodeJS Web Server Frida Frida on Local machine, can be installed using pip install frida Frida Server on Android device, download latest version from GitHub Releases Burpsuite

item.title: AES Killer - Usage Guide
item.description: Demo App For this usage guide, I’ll be using the AES Killer - DemoÂ App where I have simulated all possible scenarios with different variation in request and response to cover maximum possible combination which could occur. I have simulated the below mention test cases Complete Request & Response request Specific Request Parameters and complete response Specific JSON Request parameters & complete response Specific Request and Response Parameters Override Request & Response The application is sending back post data in response
